name: Spurti Devadhar
review: Pathetic.We admitted my 88-year Grandpa for a cardiac emergency. They kept him on a temporary pacemaker for 1 week and made him undergo 3 dialysis sessions. He was assigned to the basement ICU. After 7 days, we were not happy with the treatment and took him home after some unimaginably terrible bed sores. They also scared us that he was in no condition to be taken home and that he would collapse immediately. The doctor on duty was very harsh while removing the temporary Pacemaker. Overall, we were very disheartened by the entire treatment procedure, the doctors and the attitude of the sisters on call. Only some of the cleaning ladies were empathetic.Pathetic.We admitted my 88-year Grandpa for a cardiac emergency.
